page.title: 11P 7 ATTITUDE SURVEY
page.content: The Survey held in June 1985 by pupils of Muir Street Primary School was of 300 Primary 7 pupils in Motherwell District. Kenny Dalglish and Paul McStay are Scottish footballers. Clint Eastwood is a film star. George Michael of Wham, Paul Young and Boy George are Pop Singers. Mrs Thatcher is Prime Minister. Princess Diana is the wife of Prince Charles. The Young Ones is an unusual situation comedy. Dallas and Dynasty are American soap operas. Grange Hill is a children's drama series set in a comprehensive school. Ghostbusters is a comedy - horror film. The participating schools were{Calder, Lawmuir, Logans, {Mossend, St. Bernadette's, Ladywell {and Muir Street Primary Schools. }
